review: My internet speed is 50mps and the connection is great. Very simple to use as well.
author: Trent Holec

review: The firestick is awesome. Im so glad i bought it. We were hooking the laptops up to the tv to watch stuff and now we can stream and surf the net. Every Americans dream. The remote works good. The only issue I have is HBOgo is on there but I heard there is a new app where you can stream HBO without having cable and they dont have that app yet. Im sure it will get updated.
author: Jack Christy

review: Easy to set up, easy to use.
author: Donald Lyons

review: This Fire TV Stick is amazing! I'm able to.watch Netflix, Hulu, Amazon Prime, YouTube & lots of other apps on my TV. Also, I'm.able to watch the XBMC platform on Fire TV as well. Also, the Fire TV Stick has a great price tag at $39.99. This is the perfect TV streaming device.
author: martywaring

review: Without the prime subscription, it's worthless
author: Dalisher
